name: Willem Van Spronsen
description:
David Giusti talks about his neighbor, Willem Van Spronsen, who was shot and killed by police while protesting at the Tacoma Detention Center. Video shot on July 16, 2019.
Video by Tony Overman/The News Tribune

Read more: https://www.thenewstribune.com/news/local/article232755852.html
